mapper.insert: insert into upkeep (upkeep_type, upkeep_content, upkeep_time, owners_id) values (#{upkeepType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upkeepContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upkeepTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ownersId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.sql: upkeep_id, upkeep_type, upkeep_content, upkeep_time, upkeep_handle_time, upkeep_process, upkeep_result, owners_id, admin_id
mapper.insert:
insert into upkeep
upkeep_id,
upkeep_type,
upkeep_content,
upkeep_time,
upkeep_handle_time,
upkeep_process,
upkeep_result,
owners_id,
admin_id,

mapper.update:
update upkeep
upkeep_type = #{upkeepType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upkeep_content = #{upkeepContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upkeep_time = #{upkeepTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upkeep_handle_time = #{upkeepHandleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upkeep_process = #{upkeepProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upkeep_result = #{upkeepResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owners_id = #{ownersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where upkeep_id = #{upkeepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
